title: Embedding and correlation tensor for XRP transaction networks. (arXiv:2305.09917v1 [physics.soc-ph])
abstract: Cryptoassets are growing rapidly worldwide. One of the large cap cryptoassets is XRP. In this article, we focus on analyzing transaction data for the 2017-2018 period that consist one of the significant XRP market price bursts. We construct weekly weighted directed networks of XRP transactions. These weekly networks are embedded on continuous vector space using a network embedding technique that encodes structural regularities present in the network structure in terms of node vectors. Using a suitable time window we calculate a correlation tensor. A double singular value decomposition of the correlation tensor provides key insights about the system. The significance of the correlation tensor is captured using a randomized correlation tensor. We present a detailed dependence of correlation tensor on model parameters.

Title: Embedding and correlation tensor for XRP transaction networks. (arXiv:2305.09917v1 [physics.soc-ph])
Abstract: Cryptoassets are growing rapidly worldwide. One of the large cap cryptoassets is XRP. In this article, we focus on analyzing transaction data for the 2017-2018 period that consist one of the significant XRP market price bursts. We construct weekly weighted directed networks of XRP transactions. These weekly networks are embedded on continuous vector space using a network embedding technique that encodes structural regularities present in the network structure in terms of node vectors. Using a suitable time window we calculate a correlation tensor. A double singular value decomposition of the correlation tensor provides key insights about the system. The significance of the correlation tensor is captured using a randomized correlation tensor. We present a detailed dependence of correlation tensor on model parameters.
translated_title: XRP交易网络嵌入和相关张量的研究
translated_abstract: 加密资产在全球范围内迅速增长，其中一个市值较大的加密资产是XRP。本文针对2017年至2018年期间的交易数据进行分析，这段时间内XRP市场价格出现了显著的波动。我们构建了XRP交易的按周加权定向网络。利用网络嵌入技术将这些按周网络嵌入到连续向量空间中，将网络结构中存在的结构规律编码为节点向量。通过适当的时间窗口计算相关张量，对相关系统提供了关键见解。使用随机相关张量捕捉相关张量的显著性。我们展示了相关张量对模型参数依赖的详细情况。
tldr: 对XRP交易网络进行了嵌入和相关分析，揭示了系统的关键见解。
en_tdlr: This paper analyzes the XRP transaction data during 2017-2018 and constructs weekly weighted directed networks. The networks are embedded using a network embedding technique and a correlation tensor is calculated using a suitable time window, which provides key insights about the system. The significance of the correlation tensor is captured using a randomized correlation tensor and the paper presents a detailed dependence of the correlation tensor on model parameters.
